Malleson wires 1st October: "1. Arrival at Merv of six Afghan officials confirmed. One goes to (corrupt group), and for the present five remain in Merv. These are presumably the party who left Herat for Khusk on 11th September." 2. Merv correspondent reports Bolshevic proclamation issued conscripting every one between the ages of 15 and 55.." 3. Treatment of Persians by Bolshevics is said to be becoming harsher, tlue to Anglo-Persian agreement." 4. Rumours of strong anti-(? Bolshevic) movement at (blank group) theatre reaching Merv."
